member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Car.DefaultPrice
member.summary: Property which stores the default Price, before any discounts

member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Car.Licenseplate
member.summary: Property which stores the License plate number, string

member.name: P:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Car.Date
member.summary: Property which stores a Date, type DateTime

member.name: M:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Car.Price
member.summary: Method returning the price (double) of the Car, default 240. It's virtual because it can be override in kid classes

member.name: M:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Method returning the Vehicle Type (string), default "Car". Virtual because it can be override in kid classes

member.name: T:ClassLibraryTicketSystem.MC
member.summary: MC is inheriting the Car class, and overrides it with it's unique specifications. For more info and to understand this class better, check the Car class
